DOC.brief_summary: Confirm with invasive measurement the presence of a Walking-Induced Transient Hack (WITH) profile
DOC.brief_title: Intra-arterial Measurement of pO2 in Walking Induced Transient Hack Profiles
DOC.detailed_description: Arterial PO2 and body temperature measurements during exercise
DOC.criteria: walking induced transient Hack (WITH) tcpO2 profile rejection by patient
